snippet: Only one of the five communities had over 5,000 subscribers, Reddit said. It ridiculed overweight people.
abstract: Social networking and news site Reddit says it has removed five groups, month after announcing new guidelines against harassment; only one of five had over 5,000 subscribers.
lead_paragraph: Only one of the five communities had over 5,000 subscribers, Reddit said. It ridiculed overweight people.

headline.print_headline: Reddit Banishes 5 Groups From Site Over Harassment
headline.main: Reddit Banishes 5 Groups From Site Over Harassment
